long_description: An agile ride on and off the pavement, the Cannondale Althea 1 women's bike shifts from urban rides to gravel-road adventures with smooth Shimano components, disc brakes and a shock-absorbent fork. HeadShok Fatty DL50 suspension fork provides 50mm of pothole-damping suspension; suspension can be locked out when it's not needed. Shimano Alivio shifters, Acera and Deore derailleurs guide the chain through 27 smooth-shifting gear combinations to spin easily on any terrain you may encounter. Hybrid design blends the speed of a road bike with the sturdy, heads-up ride of a mountain-bike inspired frame; low stand-over height makes mounts and dismounts easy. Frame also uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to damp road vibration for a smoother ride quality. Cannondale Helix 6 hydraulic disc brakes supply quick, powerful speed management in all conditions, even rain. Kenda Happy Medium tires have a fast-rolling center with aggressive outside lugs for enhanced cornering traction. Platform pedals accommodate everyday shoes-just hop on and go. Specs on the Cannondale Althea 1 women's bike are subject to change.
